# Arcane Fusion, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Universal Spells|Universal]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S; see text

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 96

*You weave two powerful spells together in your mind and release them in a single intertwined display of magical prowess.*

This spell works like *[[Arcane Fusion (Spell)|arcane fusion]]**,* except that you choose any 4th-level or lower sorcerer spell that you know and any 7th-level or lower sorcerer spell that you know to cast together.
